mapper.insert: insert into Meals( no, user_id, subject, img, file_dir meal_score, type_code, meal_time, meal_amount, post_date )values ( #{no}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{img}, #{fileDir}, #{mealScore}, #{typeCode}, #{mealTime}, #{mealAmount}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEALS where trunc(post_date) = to_date(#{postDate},'yyyyMMdd')
